messages.message: Hey team, speaking of simplifying, I made an epic (https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-3897) to track all the existing feature flags that can be deleted. As a reminder, any feature flag that's GA'ed for more than 2 releases and in community_or_above/commercial_or_above tiers can be removed! When you get some free cycles, please clean up the feature flags you added!

And here's are the steps to delete feature flags
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1XbszN-7RRfv6uSYcdGzLmcEumy1dYu5xM8Nazp1TJBs/edit?tab=t.0#heading=h.gh8r2f3jq18y
Thank you!! :heart: love all this cleanup
